properties.query: Syslog | where (Facility == 'authpriv' and SyslogMessage has 'sshd:auth' and SyslogMessage has 'authentication failure') or (Facility == 'auth' and ((SyslogMessage has 'Failed' and SyslogMessage has 'invalid user' and SyslogMessage has 'ssh2') or SyslogMessage has 'error: PAM: Authentication failure')) | summarize count() by Computer
